The Hanglaiwan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Yulin, Shaanxi Province, China

operators: Shaanxi Youse Yulin Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: Shaanxi Youse Yulin Coal Industry Company operates the mine, which is owned by Shaanxi Youser Group and Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Group.
